CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Taking advantage of the temperature - dependent aggregation effect , BHJ PSCs with PffBB-n:PC71BM as an active blend layer spin - coated at different temperatures were fabricated and investigated which showed considerably various photovoltaic performance.

Let's think step by step.

1. BHJ PSCs (Bulk Heterojunction Photovoltaic Solar Cells) - active blend layer
2. PffBB-n - material name not clearly defined, but it is a component of the active blend layer
3. PC71BM - full form is not provided, but it is a material and a component of the active blend layer

Note: The paragraph is discussing the fabrication and investigation of BHJ PSCs with a specific active blend layer consisting of PffBB-n and PC71BM. The temperature-dependent aggregation effect is being utilized during the spin-coating process. However, the exact chemical nature or structure of PffBB-n is not provided in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. BHJ PSCs - active blend layer
2. PffBB-n
3. PC71BM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| BHJ PSCs |
| PffBB-n |
| PC71BM |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Taking advantage of the temperature - dependent aggregation effect , BHJ PSCs with PffBB-n:PC71BM as an active blend layer spin - coated at different temperatures were fabricated and investigated which showed considerably various photovoltaic performance.

Let's think step by step.

1. Temperature: This is a property name that refers to the degree of hotness or coldness of an object or environment.
2. Photovoltaic performance: This is a property name that refers to the ability of a photovoltaic device to convert light into electrical energy.

These are the two property name entities in the given paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. Temperature: This is a material property that can affect the behavior and performance of a substance.
2. Photovoltaic performance: This is a material property that describes the ability of a photovoltaic material to convert light into electrical energy.

These are the two material property entities in the given paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Taking advantage of the temperature - dependent aggregation effect , BHJ PSCs with PffBB-n:PC71BM as an active blend layer spin - coated at different temperatures were fabricated and investigated which showed considerably various photovoltaic performance.

Let's think step by step.

1. "temperature-dependent aggregation effect" - This could be considered a property value, as it describes a property (aggregation effect) that is dependent on a certain variable (temperature).
2. "photovoltaic performance" - This is also a property value, as it describes the performance of the BHJ PSCs, which is a property that can vary.

Therefore, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are "temperature-dependent aggregation effect" and "photovoltaic performance".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. "temperature-dependent aggregation effect" - This is a material property that is dependent on temperature.
2. "photovoltaic performance" - This is a material property that describes the performance of the BHJ PSCs.

Therefore, the relevant entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property in the paragraph are "temperature-dependent aggregation effect" and "photovoltaic performance".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| temperature-dependent aggregation effect |
| photovoltaic performance |
